Atilla [arr. Round]
Waverley Market, Edinburgh 2nd annual contest Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Monday, October 19, 1896; pg. 4; Issue 13512. Where this contradicts more recent S(A)BBA publications, the original newpaper report is preferred. 11 bands competed.
Sept. 13, 2010, 8:48 a.m. July 2, 2019, 3:09 p.m.
